short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps developers build responsive emails for all email clients and devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of Outlook screwing up your Klaviyo Emails?

The EmailPerfect Chrome extension is a simple way to fix your emails so they show up perfectly on all email clients.
